changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `WORKSPACE_AUTH_DOMAIN` ( `workspace_id` binary(16) NOT NULL, `group_name` varchar(254) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`group_name`,`workspace_id`), KEY `FK_AUTH_DOMAIN_WS` (`workspace_id`), KEY `FK_AUTH_DOMAIN_GROUP` (`group_name`), CONSTRAINT `FK_AUTH_DOMAIN_GROUP` FOREIGN KEY (`group_name`) REFERENCES `GROUP` (`NAME`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `FK_AUTH_DOMAIN_WS` FOREIGN KEY (`workspace_id`) REFERENCES `WORKSPACE` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION )

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO WORKSPACE_AUTH_DOMAIN (workspace_id, group_name) SELECT id, realm_group_name FROM WORKSPACE WHERE REALM_GROUP_NAME IS NOT NULL
